3.name: Narration
3.text:
The goblins' prized Goblin Tank explodes. Along
with the spectacularly burning tank, the goblins'
plans turn to ashes.

5.name: Adventurer
5.text: "I guess it's mostly taken care of..."

6.name: Erick
6.text:
"I looked around a bit, but... Hmm, something's
strange. The number of carriages and the amount of
luggage don't seem to match."

7.name: Adventurer
7.text:
"I see. It seems someone has already taken the
spoils and fled. For goblins, it doesn't seem like
just simple looting."

8.name: Adventurer
8.text:
"I'd like to search and annihilate them, but...
we're short on hands. Besides, right now we need
to go help over there first."

9.name: Erick
9.text:
"I see... Reporting to the guild takes priority,
doesn't it?"

14.name: Peddler
14.text:
"Ah, ah... I'm sorry, thank goodness you're
safe... Miss... No, that tail... is it from a
dragon!?"

16.name: Peddler
16.text:
"Oh, how...!!! This is truly fortunate...! To
think I could survive...! Thank you so much for
saving me...!!"

17.name: Sol
17.text:
"Ehehe, you're welcome! But more importantly,
let's head to the village first!! 'It's safe to
relax only after returning to a secure place'!
That's what Sensei taught me!"

21.name: Peddler
21.text:
"Oh, Lady Sol! Thank you so much for everything!!
Thanks to you, I was able to transport the goods
safely...!!"

22.name: Peddler
22.text:
"I know it's not much of a thank-you, but please
accept this tribute...!!"

24.name: Peddler
24.text:
"And thanks to Lady Sol, I can resume my business!
If I find any rare items, I will definitely show
them to Lady Sol first! If you have the time,
please come and visit!"

25.name: Erick
25.text:
"Hey, are you not going to give me that rare
find?"

36.name: Adventurer
36.text: "...! Is that a fire starting to blaze...?"

37.name: Adventurer
37.text:
"Hey, that's a carriage of a traveling merchant
heading towards the village of Ruclaire."

38.name: Adventurer
38.text: "The goblins, are they aiming for that...?!"
